Its time we draw an ending line to the one handedness of Norway in chess... Magnus Carlsen is right 
 
now the undisputed champion of chess across the world. We will bring India to the top nations 
 
playing chess very soon. With the vision of making a few grandmasters in all fields we hereby 
 
introduce CHESS-MATE. 
 
Rules and Regulations: 
 
 A multistage event, each being elimination round. 
 
 Decision on both the defensive and offensive playing patterns of the player are tested at 
 
the same time. 
 
 A player has to eliminate 'Soldiers' of their opponents and earn points. Every 'soldier' will 
 
carry a definite point which will be credited to the player. In case of draw, the judgement 
 
shall be on strategy. 
 
 Time allotted for each game is a maximum of 20 minutes 
 
 The two finalists shall fight each other till Check-mate 
 
 The colour choice will be done by a coin-toss 
 
 In case of draw, the total point shall be considered 
 
 No points for castle or check. The reason is these are all tricks not pieces. One player can 
 
give infinite times of check to gain Points 
 
 Board point will be considered only in case of tie in match or selection procedure. 
 
 International chess rules are to be followed.Some relaxation can be made by the judge if it is 
 
required in case. otherwise Winning will always get the preference. 
 
 All the round will be knock-out round. 
 
Move/Piece Points 
 
Check mate / Resign 100 
 
Queen / General 10 
 
Knight 4 
 
Bishop 3 
 
Rook 5 
 
Pawns 1
